page.title: 14Ravenstock Farm
page.content: Ravenstock farm is an all-arable farm. The main crops that are grown there are wheat, barley, and peas. The farm consists of over five hundred acres of land, and another three hundred is hired every year. Ravenstock is on the edge of a busy little village called Hadstock. The farm was started by Mr.Barker's grandfather, when he came down from the north of England. The only animals that are kept are pets such as cats and dogs. The three farmers there are all brothers. They go shopping in Saffron Walden often, because it is the largest town nearby. Also they go to get the farm machines mended if any go wrong. They buy all their farm machinery from Saffron Walden. The farmers' families hardly ever get any summer holidays because of harvest-time.
